name: Transparent NPC Wall for Links
description: An invisible wall that blocks links from passing through.

fields.name: Activation Variable
fields.description: The local variable that triggers or activates this actor. (0 = always active)

fields.name: Horizontal Length
fields.description: The horizontal length of the transparent NPC wall.

fields.name: Vertical Length
fields.description: The vertical length of the transparent NPC wall.
